### Published Research

```{r, output='asis', echo=F}
sid <- 'jSGgb-QAAAAJ'
pubs <- scholar::get_publications(sid)

pubs <- pubs[rev(order(pubs$year)), ]

lst <- paste0(
  ' - __[',     pubs$title, '](',  scholar::get_article_scholar_url(sid, pubs$pubid)
, ')__.',
  '  \n   ', pubs$author, '.',
  '  \n   ', pubs$journal, ', ', pubs$year,  '.',
  collapse='\n'
)

lst <- stringr::str_replace_all(lst, 'M(ichael)?\\s*(P|Philip)?\\s*Pascale', '__\\0__')

cat(lst)
```

_Retrieved from [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=jSGgb-QAAAAJ) with the R Package [`scholar`](https://github.com/jkeirstead/scholar)._
